prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with a sleek body and a menacing expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses its scent to confuse enemies during battle.
Show me a creature with a striking purple and cream color combination.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a cunning personality.
Design a Pokemon that can spray a noxious substance to fend off threats.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a skunk and has a unique combat style.
Make a Pokemon that evolves from a smaller creature into a more intimidating form.

distinctive_features: Distinctive cream stripe along the back
